page.title: 20POPULATION
page.content: { All the 532 people living in the area are native to Britain, 106 are children and 138 are retired. The majority of retired people lead a very active life with wide interests. For the less able Meals On Wheels are available and social service care is augmented very often by good neighbours. The teenager tends to find more going on in the near by town Dumfries, meeting their friends in leisure centres and public houses. There is a good cross section of people in the community although neither the parish minister nor the local headmaster live in the area. The information given has had to be more condensed than one would wish.
